boat.construction_details: GRP simulated clinker hull, teak gunwhale, thwarts and mast partners. Pine floorboards and bronze fittings, spruce spars.

for_sales.sales_text:
GRP hull simulated clinker Built in buoyancy forward and aft Teak gunwales and teak thwart and centreboard box top Galvanised steel centre plate with hoist lead aft to jammer Teak stock White painted rudder blade Ash tiller with tiller extension Fitted Canvas cushions over forward and aft side seats and centre thwart and over forward and aft  buoyancy tanks, all of which are easily portable Waterproof hatch on forward buoyancy tank Oars, bronze rowlocks and fittings Outboard 2hp Mariner and stainless steel transom outboard bracket Sovereign Combination trailer with 10” road wheels plus one spare wheel which is unused Rig: Spruce mast, gaff and boom Stainless steel standing rigging Sheets and halyards Mainsheet traveller on transom, adjustable Ratchet mainsheet take off from centre block on boom Jib sheets on jammer Sails by Simon Richardson, modified batten pockets Original overall cover in a serviceable condition One year old overall cover with mast up

All of the above is in good condition.

Selling the vessel due to looking for smaller and lighter dinghy .

boat.name: Pipit
boat.short_description: Pipit is a Wagtail sailing dinghy built in 2010
